data.eml:eml: Three new species of Phyllocoptinae mites (Prostigmata: Eriophyidae) associated with ornamental plants in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Navia, Denise, Flechtmann, Carlos H. W. (2007): Three new species of Phyllocoptinae mites (Prostigmata: Eriophyidae) associated with ornamental plants in Brazil. Zootaxa 1386: 39-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175128
